name: Gem's English Grammar 6
description: The Gems English Grammar App is designed to improve the basic language skills of the user. In order to express yourself correctly and appropriately, the app provides you a selective overview of the key areas that you need to master.  Beat the clock and attempt the exercises based on grammar, spellings, pronunciation, composition and comprehension.   There are four assets in each chaptergrammar games, grammar detective, spell-o-fun and pronunciation. There is also a common assetconversation practicein the app.   The exercises in the assets include questions based on the grammar concepts taught in a particular chapter.  Spell-o-fun helps enrich the vocabulary and spelling of the user. The user is supposed to decipher the word based on the meaning given along with the audio of the word. There are three levels of difficulty, level one being the easiest.   Pronunciation helps the user learn and practise the pronunciation of various difficult words in a chapter. It enables users to record and listen to the pronunciation of words. They can also compare their recorded pronunciation with the pre-recorded pronunciation.   To enhance your conversation skills, use the conversation practice asset by listening, practising and speaking. There are three sets of conversation practice in the app. Each set consists of a pre-recorded conversation, questions based on the conversation and additional questions to help the user practise similar conversations.   Use the Gems English Grammar App for an engaging and enriching experience.  Here is the link to what the app has in store for you- https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=u5EwhbbUVdY&feature=youtu.be
